domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text:
What is the matter with people?

My sweet daughter just came back from her 8hr shift at Tesco in tears as so many customers had been swearing at her and calling her names just for trying to impose @Tesco social distancing policy.

It's not necessary!
